title: 9.2.3 Organization-wide security posture dashboard
body:
## Parent Epic
Part of Epic 9: Advanced Security Scanning (#127)

## Objective
Create a comprehensive dashboard providing organization-wide visibility into security posture across all AWS accounts with trend analysis, heat maps, and executive-level metrics.

## Requirements
- Aggregate security findings across all accounts
- Display organization-wide security score and trends
- Provide account-level security scores with ranking
- Show top security issues across organization
- Heat map visualization of accounts by security posture
- Trend charts showing improvement/degradation over time
- Executive summary with key metrics and recommendations
- Drill-down capability from organization to account to resource
- Exportable reports for stakeholders
- Integration with Intelligence-Builder SDK for AI-powered insights

## Dashboard Components

### Overview Section
- Total accounts monitored
- Organization-wide security score (0-100)
- Total findings by severity (critical, high, medium, low)
- Compliance status across frameworks
- Trend indicators (improving/declining)

### Account Heat Map
- Visual grid of all accounts
- Color-coded by security score (green=good, red=poor)
- Hover details: account name, score, critical findings count
- Click to drill down to account details

### Top Issues Section
- Most common security issues across organization
- Issue frequency and affected accounts count
- Prioritized remediation recommendations
- Estimated time to remediate

### Trend Analysis
- 30/60/90-day security score trends
- New findings vs resolved findings over time
- Compliance trend tracking
- Account comparison over time

### Recommendations Panel
- AI-powered prioritized recommendations from Intelligence-Builder SDK
- Quick wins (easy fixes with high impact)
- Critical path issues (blockers for compliance)
- Resource optimization opportunities

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Dashboard UI implemented with all sections
- [ ] Organization-wide aggregation logic implemented
- [ ] Security score calculation algorithm defined and tested
- [ ] Heat map visualization rendering correctly
- [ ] Trend charts displaying historical data
- [ ] Drill-down navigation working from org → account → resource
- [ ] Export functionality for PDF/CSV reports
- [ ] Integration with Intelligence-Builder SDK for recommendations
- [ ] Real-time updates when scans complete
- [ ] Responsive design for mobile/tablet viewing
- [ ] Unit tests for aggregation logic (>80% coverage)
- [ ] Integration test validates end-to-end dashboard
- [ ] Documentation includes dashboard user guide
- [ ] Dashboard loads in <3 seconds for 100+ accounts

## Technical Approach
- Backend: Aggregation queries for organization-wide metrics
- Frontend: React components with visualization libraries (Chart.js, D3.js)
- Caching: Redis cache for expensive aggregations
- Database: Materialized views for performance
- Real-time updates: WebSocket or polling for scan progress
- Leverage Intelligence-Builder SDK for AI insights

## Estimated Effort
28-32 hours

## Dependencies
- Multi-account scanning support (issue 9.2.1)
- Historical scan data in database
- Intelligence-Builder SDK integration
- Frontend visualization libraries
